name: Mini Golf 3D
description:
Top 10 game in 5 countries in Game/Sports and Game/Simulation.

3D Mini Golf game on the Appstore! 54 insanely fun holes, spread across 3 environments with 5 exciting, loveable characters to choose from.

Mini Golf 3D is an extensive, feature-rich game with progressive play with 54 holes spread across 3 increasingly challenging levels of 18 holes each.

This highly customizable game lets you choose to play as 1 of 5 exciting characters, each having their own personality. The levels are designed to ensure maximum fun and replayability through multiple challenges consisting of moving & static obstacles and hazards, just like the real thing! Grab a putter and enjoy the coolest 3D golf experience this season!

Features:
- The most fun and addictive Mini-Golf game with 54 exciting pars & 4 unique game modes, spread across 3 beautiful environments.
- Play 18 holes free & with 36 additional holes for purchase within the game.
- Compete against yourself and other players on the global leaderboards.
- Collect tons of achievements.
- Show off your high scores and kick up a challenge on Facebook or Twitter.
